Room.Name: Llanandar Creek
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the bank of a sparkling little creek.
Room.LongDescription: Sparkling lights seem to pop all about you, and tiny wings flutter at your ear. You can hear a tinkling little laughter and the sound of a musical instrument somewhere close by. The great oaks make a ring around this meadow, bounded on the west by a wonderful little creek. The path continues to the north and south.
